meanings.definition: A person who derives sexual pleasure from feces.
meanings.sent1: Some coprophiliacs find excitement in feces.
meanings.sent2: Coprophiliacs have a unique sexual preference.
meanings.sent3: The coprophiliacs at the party had an odd taste in entertainment.
meanings.sent4: Her obsession with feces made her the coprophiliac of the group.
meanings.sent5: The coprophiliacs' unusual desires puzzled many.

meanings.definition: Those who have a sexual interest in feces.
meanings.sent1: There are coprophiliacs who are fascinated by feces.
meanings.sent2: The coprophiliacs' interest in feces is concerning to some.
meanings.sent3: The coprophiliacs' unusual hobby raised eyebrows at the picnic.
meanings.sent4: His collection of feces marked him as a coprophiliac in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The coprophiliacs' passion for feces was undeniable.
